problem.markdown:
>>Which District(s) have populations between 200,000 - 500,000 for this period? (select one or more)<< [x] Dessert District [x] Sweet District [x] Insect District [ ] Game District
[explanation] Dessert, Sweet and Insect Districts have populations between 200,000 - 500,000 for this period [explanation]
problem.p: Which District(s) have populations between 200,000 - 500,000 for this period? (select one or more)
